vote.title: Authorize the second step of acquisition for condemnation by eminent domain to acquire from Joe Delores Deleon and wife of approximately 3,733 square feet of land located near the intersection of Poe and McPherson Streets for the West Dallas Gateway Project. - Not to exceed $133,850.00 ($128,000.00 plus closing cost and title expenses not to exceed $5,850.00) - Financing: 2024B Certificates of Obligation Fund
